曓字的基本解释

曓
bào
古同“暴”。

曓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bào］
［《廣韻》薄報切，去号，並。］
亦作“曓1”。
(1)凶恶残酷。
(2)指强暴凶恶的人或行为。
(3)欺凌；凌辱。
(4)损害；糟蹋。
(5)暴乱。
(6)患，祸害。
(7)急骤；猛烈。
(8)暴躁；急躁。
(9)猝然；突然。
(10)短促。
(11)徒手搏击。
(12)古时区域单位。方六里之地。
(13)古时户籍单位。五十家为暴。
(14)古地名。在今河南省原阳县西。
(15)姓。汉代有暴胜之。见《汉书·隽不疑传》。
[②]［pù］
［《廣韻》蒲木切，入屋，並。］
［《廣韻》薄報切，去号，並。］
(1)晒。
(2)（今读bào）显露；暴露。
(3)指披布；披露。
[③]［bó］
［《集韻》北角切，入覺，幫。］
(1)（今读bào）鼓起；突出。
(2)见“暴3樂”。

曓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曓； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页500第33
【唐韻】薄報切。【說文】疾有所趨也。【玉篇】猶耗也，猝也。今作暴。

曓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
曓字的起名意思

暂无。

曓
Basic explanation of words
曓
bào
Gu Tong is "violent."
曓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bào］
["Guang Yun" report cut, go to the number, and merge. ]
Also known as "曓1".
(1) Fierce and cruel.
(2) Refers to violent and vicious persons or behaviors.
(3) Bullying; humiliation.
(4) Damage; spoil.
(5) Riots.
(6) Suffering, scourge.
(7) Rapid; violent.
(8) Cranky; irritable.
(9) Suddenly; suddenly.
(10) Shortness.
(11) Unarmed combat.
(12) Ancient regional unit. A place of six miles away.
(13) Ancient household registration unit. Fifty families are violent.
(14) Ancient place names. In the west of Yuanyang County, Henan Province today.
(15) Last name. In the Han Dynasty, there were violent victory. See "Han Shu·Jun Bu Dou Biography".
[②]［pù］
["Guangyun" Pu Mu cut, enter the house, and merge. ]
["Guang Yun" report cut, go to the number, and merge. ]
(1) Sun.
(2) (Now read bào) reveal; expose.
(3) Refers to cloth; disclosure.
[③]［bó］
["Ji Yun" North Point cut, enter into sleep, help. ]
(1) (pronounced bào today) bulging; protruding.
(2) See "Bao 3 Le".
曓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　曓; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 500 33
[Tang Yun] The report is cut. 【Said the text】Illnesses are trending. 【Jade articles】It's still exhausting and sudden. This is violent.
